item.title: My Manga Tracking List
item.author: hello@forevergenin.com (Premkumar Subramanian)
item.description: Last updated on March 15, 2018 “Do. Or do not. There is no try.” ― Master Yoda Last updated on September 15, 2017 “Every form of addiction is bad, no matter whether the narcotic be alcohol, morphine or idealism.” ― C.G. Jung This is my official track list for all the Mangas/Manhwas I have completed or currently reading. Currently Reading: One Piece 907 Tales of Demons and Gods 108 Gamble Fish 1 Noblesse 515 Spirit Blade Mountain 137 D.
